title: Bisket Jatra Festival
description: Traditional New Year celebration in Bhaktapur with chariot processions.

title: Gaijatra
description: A colorful festival honoring the departed with parades and performances in Kathmandu.

title: Dashain
description: The biggest Hindu festival in Nepal, celebrated with family gatherings and blessings.

title: Holi
description: Festival of colors celebrated across Nepal with vibrant powders and water.

title: Tihar
description: Festival of lights honoring animals, siblings, and wealth with decorations and rituals.
